This Shiny application is part of the Developing Data Products Coursera course project <https://www.coursera.org/learn/data-products/>.

The application performs a multiple regression model on the Longley economic dataset included in the R datasets package. <https://www.statsmodels.org/dev/datasets/generated/longley.html>
